sentences.en: The company's chief operating officer was the numero-uno fund-raiser for the event.
sentences.cn: 该公司的首席运营官曾是这个活动的最佳募捐者。

sentences.en: As a fund-raiser, police officers will don aprons, take orders and bus tables today.
sentences.cn: 作为募捐方，警官们今天将穿上围裙，接受点菜，收拾餐桌。

sentences.en: Barack Obama is a formidable campaigner and fund-raiser.
sentences.cn: 巴拉克·奥巴马是一个可畏的活动家和筹款人。
